Uses of Package
utils.db

  • Packages that use utils.db 
    Package Description
    models
    Package containing all data classes that are stored in the database.
    utils.access
    Package containing the RecordManager and query engine.
    utils.access.index
    Package containing classes to build, maintain and query encrypted indexes
    utils.db
    Package containing classes needed for database access and mapping
  • Classes in utils.db used by models 
    Class and Description
    LostUpdateException
    Exception is thrown if a database change would cause data to be lost due to concurrent updates
    NotMaterialized
    Field annotation for fields that should never be stored in the database
  • Classes in utils.db used by utils.access 
    Class and Description
    FileStorage.FileData
    Inner class used for passing back the filename along with the input stream when retrieving a file.
    LostUpdateException
    Exception is thrown if a database change would cause data to be lost due to concurrent updates
    NotMaterialized
    Field annotation for fields that should never be stored in the database
  • Classes in utils.db used by utils.access.index 
    Class and Description
    LostUpdateException
    Exception is thrown if a database change would cause data to be lost due to concurrent updates
    NotMaterialized
    Field annotation for fields that should never be stored in the database
  • Classes in utils.db used by utils.db 
    Class and Description
    Database
    Base class for database implementations
    DatabaseConversionException
    Exception throws if conversion between BSON and data model classes fails
    DatabaseException
    Exception thrown on database errors
    FileStorage.FileData
    Inner class used for passing back the filename along with the input stream when retrieving a file.
    LostUpdateException
    Exception is thrown if a database change would cause data to be lost due to concurrent updates
    MongoDatabase
    Connection to a mongoDB database
